archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.4.4d: d) the use of insecure design techniques should be prohibited (e.g. the use of hard-coded passwords/passphrases, unapproved code samples and unauthenticated web services).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
